entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -12.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -14.7°C
Wind: S 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Blizzard developing early this evening and ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
